update.description: Start an EAS update for your expo project

build.description: Start an EAS build for your expo project

build-list.description: List all EAS builds for your Expo project

run.description: Run the Android app binary locally or run the iOS app binary locally

start.description: Start a local dev server for the app or start a Webpack dev server for the web app

sync-deps.description: Syncs dependencies to package.json (required for autolinking).

ensure-symlink.description: Ensure workspace node_modules is symlink under app's node_modules folder.

prebuild.description: Create native iOS and Android project files for building natively.

install.description: Install a module or other package to a project.

export.description: Export the JavaScript and assets for your app using Metro/webpack bundler

submit.description: Submit app binary to App Store and/or Play Store

serve.description: Serve up the Expo web app locally
